segments.text: I find myself chuckling as the boy clambers onto that wobbly stool, it’s like watching a little monkey.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement is infectious as he reaches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I remind myself, this isn’t just fun and games.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? What if he slips in the puddle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, her little arm reaching up like a hopeful flower yearning for the sun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a bit amused at their secretive heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I also wonder how the woman would react if she knew.
segments.speaker: PAR
